VoiceMailGreeting.name: VoiceMailGreeting
VoiceMailGreeting.description: Represents a custom greeting message that plays upon reaching a user’s voicemail.

DurationInSeconds.description: The duration of the voicemail greeting message in seconds.

IsDefault.description: Whether the greeting is the user’s default greeting (true) or not (false).

MediaContentId.description: ID of the related content document.

Name.description: The name of the voicemail greeting message.

OwnerId.description: ID of the voicemail greeting message owner.
